page.title: 06EVENTS IN CRUDEN BAY.
page.content: Every year the Gala Committee organises a week of fun for the villagers. In the main street car park a driving skills competition is held . For the children there is a Cycle kick start. A pram and 'cartie' race is held for children and adults. That evening there is a Disco where the Gala Queen is chosen along with two Princesses. They have to attend all the Gala events and present prizes etc. Many people help on Gala Day at things like stalls, 'Tossing the wellie", raffles tombola and teas. Races are also held for the children. The day is brought to a close with a dance. There is also an Annual Flower Show, Concerts and drama productions, as well as various activities organised for the old age pensioners, (a tea party is run by the school).
